name: Tehillim app
description: A mobile app that allows users to read Tehillim

descriptions: Leveraged a React Native component to efficiently render and display static data.
Created an interactive app that features dark/light mode, chapter bookmarking, chapter indexing, and language selection.
Implemented a custom navigation bar that allows users to easily navigate between chapters.
Added a search functionality to quickly find specific chapters or verses.
Integrated a local storage solution to save user preferences and bookmarks.
Designed a responsive UI that adapts to different screen sizes and orientations.
Included a settings page where users can customize the app's appearance and behavior.
Optimized the app for performance to ensure smooth scrolling and quick loading times.
Implemented accessibility features such as text-to-speech and adjustable font sizes.

name: Product Monitor
description: A monitor that checks product availability on retail websites

descriptions: Developed a web scraper to monitor product availability on multiple retail websites using api calls.
Implemented real-time notifications to alert users when a product becomes available.
Used discord js to send notifications and control the monitor through discord.

name: Shopify Store Webpage Design
description: A implementation of a webpage design for a Shopify store

descriptions: Implemented a custom design for a Shopify store using HTML, CSS, and Liquid.
Designed a responsive layout that adapts to different screen sizes and orientations.
Integrated a custom search bar that allows users to quickly find products by name or category.
Included a contact form that users can fill out to get in touch with the store owner.
Implemented a newsletter signup form to collect email addresses for marketing purposes.
